sources.title: The Night America Trembled (TV-1957) EDWARD R. MURROWüçï STUDIO ONE
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
CAPTURED LIVE on KINOSCOPE!
Starring: Edward R. Murrow, Ed Asner, James Colburn, Warren Beatty, Vincent Gardenia
Director: Tom Donovan
üçïSTUDIO ONE Season 10 Episode 1üçï
Tonight from Westinghouse Studio One comes a compelling dramatization of the hysteria sparked by Orson Welles‚Äô infamous radio broadcast of The War of the Worlds. 

This treasure from the Golden Age of Television not only recounts a pivotal moment in American media history but also features an impressive lineup of future stars, including Ed Asner, Vincent Gardenia, Warren Beatty, Warren Oates, and James Coburn in his TV debut. With Edward R. Murrow lending his gravitas as narrator, this is a must-see for fans of classic television!"

TRIVIA: Studio One began as a CBS radio drama in the 1940s and was reborn as a television series in 1948. It became the longest-running one-hour dramatic anthology in television history!
